title: Playing Catch Up on Oligarch Sanctions
sub_head: Why has the U.S. fallen behind the EU against Russian kleptocrats?
body:
The European Union has been leading the world on sanctions against the Kremlin oligarchs, and even the United Kingdom is finally catching up. What’s taking the Biden Administration so long?
On Thursday the U.K. announced sanctions on seven Russian oligarchs it estimates are collectively worth some £15 billion, and the following day it imposed restrictions on 386 members of the Russian Duma.
